title: Yasuo needs his remake instead of buff and debuff that ruins a champ
body:
Hey, 
So since most of players can see that yasuo is still ANOYOINGLY OP  vs low mobilty champs (like most champs...) so all i can see to stop this broken noinsense is to rework the yasuo why?
1. His mobility is way tooo huge he can dash like huge distance in seconds (the are no champ that can move this fast) 
2. Windwall yea its his defence kit but why he has to have this defence since he had his broken mobility?
3. his Q like yea you have to farm it to make that ranged attack.. but with his Q he can easly win lane hight mobility huge ranged attacks well thats op
4.his R his R is like OP but i have to admit like ultimate attack it doesnt do like alot... he is samuray so why he isnt a samuray? now he looks like failed wind mage with a sword....  

maybe change his mobility like more cd on dash (that stops his huge mobility or/and atleast he wont be hurted that bad)
windwall something has to be removed windshield or windwall i preffer windshield cus windwall is cool for him
his Q..... well samuray isnt a stab mashine so why he has stab to farm from that thronado like failed wind mage? instead make like 2-3 normal hits with sword that can farm a new skill that can release wave of sword (like x form of slash that goes for some range he is samoray not dmn mage)
his R should be changed for some art of sword not dmn wind magic trick to kick all in air and look like losser... 
i think best would be change for his R to like fast dash to his enemie and do burst of dmg and leave like marks (for 1 or 2 seconds) from his sword.. 
anyway now im waiting for ur opinions not some yasuo mains that start to flame around (most of yasuo mains can only win with yasuo sad...)

replies.body: Yasuo is fine, if he counters you then ban him out before you pick, if he doesn't counter you then just learn to fight him

after runes and masteries change he gone realy strong  armor pen and  100% crits what next ?  special item to yasuo just to make him even stronger,,,, that champ realy needs new kit! same as irelia was needed it but she now will be fine after rework....

The problem with giving him a rework is just that. Yasuo is a very unique champ, his mechanics and dashing is what makes him fun to play. And besides, countering a yasuo is easy if you know what you’re doing. 

All and all, I don’t think there is any rework needed on the champ right now.
